root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 2-1-1, translated into en
root.data:
## Regional aggregates
Regional and global aggregates of the PoU are computed as:
\\[PoU_{REG} = (_i PoU_i Ã— N_i) / (_i N_i)\\]
where PoU_i are the values of PoU estimated for all countries in the regions for which available data allow to compute a reliable estimate, and N_i the corresponding population size.
